| ![Michael Shugart](https://cityofwestorange.com/revize_photo_gallery/Government/City%20Council/Michael-Shugart.jpg) **Mike Shugart, Sr.   Current term:  2024-2026**   **Service:  2006 - present** | ![Jay Odom](https://cityofwestorange.com/revize_photo_gallery/Government/City%20Council/Jay-Odom.jpg)    **Jay Odom**   Current term:  2024-2026   Service:  2022-present |
| ![Lanie Brown](https://cityofwestorange.com/revize_photo_gallery/Government/City%20Council/Lanie-Brown.jpg)   **Lanie Brown**   **Current term:  2024 – 2026**   **Service: 2022 – present** | ![Gail Langton - Copy](https://cityofwestorange.com/revize_photo_gallery/Government/City%20Council/Gail%20Langton%20-%20Copy.jpg) **Gail Langton**   **Current term:  2025-2027**   **Service:  2025 – present** |
